leadership.name: Dr. Mary Johnson
leadership.bio: Dr. Johnson brings over 20 years of experience in economic development and entrepreneurship. She holds a Ph.D. in Business Administration and has been instrumental in shaping DKS Liberia's strategic vision.

leadership.name: James Williams
leadership.bio: James oversees all program operations and curriculum development. With a background in education and business consulting, he ensures our programs meet the highest standards of quality and effectiveness.

leadership.name: Patricia Davis
leadership.bio: Patricia manages financial operations and resource allocation. Her expertise in nonprofit finance ensures DKS Liberia operates efficiently and maximizes impact with available resources.

board.name: Robert Taylor
board.bio: Robert is a successful entrepreneur and investor with a passion for economic development. He provides strategic guidance and connects DKS Liberia with valuable resources and networks.

board.name: Susan Martinez
board.bio: Susan is a renowned economist and policy expert. She brings deep insights into economic development strategies and helps shape DKS Liberia's policy engagement initiatives.

board.name: Michael Brown
board.bio: Michael is a community leader and advocate for youth empowerment. He ensures that DKS Liberia's programs remain connected to community needs and priorities.

board.name: Elizabeth Wilson
board.bio: Elizabeth is an education specialist with expertise in adult learning and professional development. She advises on curriculum design and program effectiveness.
